1.content:
On both planets almost everything was normal for the inhabitants. Well except for one planet, strange portals appeared everywhere. Curious inhabitants approached these portals and a few even entered the portals. With a loud whoosh the inhabitants found themselves moving at high speed to a distant planet. On the distant planet whose day until then had been normal portals began to appear. Bizarrely the portals opened and exited in similar areas (desert to desert, jungle to jungle etc.) Much to the terror of the inhabitants on the exiting side was the giant animals coming out of the portals. To the 'giants' they were confused at their now shrunken surroundings.

So the fun begins and where in the 'small' world are we?
1.title: The Portals Appear

Suddenly something pops out of the portal as it closes with a loud sound, as everybody looked up they all uttered two words. “A Doberman” even though what they were seeing was plain as day the people still had troubles perceiving it, thoughts like how was this even possible crossed their minds. But one thought persisted over all else “what is going to happen”, as if answering the questions the giant raises his paw while all the people below look up with awe speechless. Then with speeds almost not matching it’s incredible height it lowers the paw smashing it right in the middle of downtown. The resulting impact creating a shockwave that envelopes everything within range, then the 500 foot tall canine barks out which causes people all over the city to cover their ears.

The dog hasn’t even noticed the people or even the city right underneath him, though the people didn’t know whether that was a good or bad thing. The Doberman slowly lifts the other massive paw up and again puts it back down, this doesn’t seem like a lot of effort is put into it but the effects on the world below is anything but harmless. And now with two massive craters and a whole lot of destruction underpaw he finally takes notice of the world below him, The giant dog...

So we shall focus on a Dire Wolf by the name of Andromeda? She is kept merely as a companion. She has thick, soft purple fur a thick white mane of fur around her head. Her belly is huge, she's over twice her ideal weight. She likes it that way. More room for treats!

One moment she was strolling along through a field the next there was a flash and she was in a different place! She looked around. The field was now covered in little houses, streets, cars and lights. In the distance she could see taller buildings. It looked like a normal city, but a toy sized one?! She had no idea that this was no toy city... Yet. She was now standing 750ft at the shoulders. Houses were barely half the height of one of her mighty paws. She yipped when she saw little creatures running about. They wore clothes, stood on two legs and had two arms like the masters back home. But they lacked their own fur, apart from on their heads and they was the size of bugs? Curious she lowered her head over a nearby group of these little creatures and sniffed. They screamed as her suction pulled them up towards her massive wet nose. A few even got sucked right up into her nose! She whined and sneezed violently. The creatures were jettisoned at very high speed with a liberal amount of snot. Their bodies crushed on impact with the ground and coasted in green slimy gunk. The ones who hadn't been sucked into her nose were blown away. Along with nearby cars. The car alarms blared and annoyed her ears! She lifted a paw and smashed it down on the cars, silencing them for good. Her paw let off a loud boom, shattering most windows within a few miles and alerting more to her presence.

People started to flee in their cars, the streets soon gridlocked. Meanwhile she looked down at the group she had sniffed and sneezed upon. They looked like they needed to calm down.... A big sloppy lick should do the trick! She opens her maw and out slides her saliva coated tongue. The people scream at the sight of her open jaws over them. Her tongue slides out and with a heavy wet slap hits the street. Cracking it under its immense weight. The tongue slides at them people. They scream and run. But the tongue is to fast and wider than the street... Her tongue was 50ft wide! People stick to the great muscle and are dragged under it as it slides along, pulverising them instantly. The tongue leaves a trail of saliva, cracked tarmac, ripped up earth and crushed vehicles. The tongue returns to her maw and she yips. Where had the creatures gone?! But she now had treats to swallow. She gulps loudly and licks her chops. Yummy! If she licked them, they gave her treats! The fact the humans WERE the 'treats' didn't cross her primitive feral mind.

She lifts her head to study the area around her. The streets are packed with these lovely little creatures. Her tongue lulled, her belly rumbled in anticipation of treats. She also had so much more lovely sloppy kisses to give out! But where to head to first? There was so many choices! There was the highway, jam packed with tens of thousands of cars. The train station was quite busy, there was several trains at the station or just pulling away. Some taller buildings nearby more her height appeared to be full of these creatures. There was the very tall skyscrapers in the city centre and there was also the airport, lots of planes were taking off. She decided to head for...

She finally heads for...

The female continued on her way, ripping up the countryside, stomping out the roadways and scaring the humans back into the city. Curious, the male dropped his head and looked underneath his legs to see what it was. Behind his hanging cock and balls, he could see that it was the edge of an office building. The edge of its roof happened to be the exact height of his behind. It cracked slightly as he rubbed against it. The feeling reminded the Hyena of the nice warm rocks he would rest himself on back at his home on the savanna. The building behind him looked to be a perfectly sized substitute to rest on! He figured his fellow clam-mates reprimanding could take a while, he might as well take a seat and watch the show.

The Hyena widened his hind legs as he began to back up over the building. Crashing could be heard from either side of the structure as the Hyenas thick paws widened the alleyways. Soon the top of the building was being covered with his fluffy behind. His greasy genitals began to drag across the top of the structure. Even the reinforced concrete was no match for his goods, as the roof began to crack and cave in slightly. His genitals finally came to a rest on the center of the roof.

A large rooftop air conditioning unit was also an unknown victim of the Hyenas actions. The large metal object was easily torn off the roof and flattened by the Hyenas left testicle. Apart from the expensive destruction, his actions also meant the ventilation shafts were now exposed. The cool refreshing air was quickly replaced with the odor of his privates and butt hole. The fragrance soon slipped into every part of the building, giving the occupance quite a "treat". The humans inside were left coughing and gagging. Their eyes watered so much that those trying to escape weren't even able to navigate their way outside the building!

However, its not like those humans had a chance to escape anyway. After a bit of shifting around, the Hyena soon felt his butt was comfortable. Suddenly, he began to fold his hind legs and carelessly apply the weight from his body onto the building below, as if he was sitting on a simple rock from back home. Unfortunately, despite the building looking and even feeling "rock like", it certainly was not as strong as one. The building crumbled as if it was made of sand and the sound of crashing could be heard all around. Floor after floor caved in, with the Hyenas penis and balls plowing through first. At least in those human's final moments, they got the answer to what was reeking. Before the Hyena could even react, his bottom was resting on the ground. The once untouched building was now completely flattened under his rump. All that remained was the unrecognizable debris under his butt and the cloud of dust that rose all around him.

The males entire body soon filled with dread. He had just flattened a few hundred more humans and butt stomped one of their hives. He felt his stomach sink as he knew what was coming. How is he punished by the Matriarch?
142332112221121211112112212.title: Taking a Seat

choices: Walk between two tightly packed skyscrapers without damaging anything
Jump from one street to the other, over a building
1423321122211212111121122122.content:
Upon hearing the violent crashing, the female looked over to the guilty males direction. Her eyes went wide as she took in the site of the male sitting on a flattened building! She furiously rushed over to his location, snarling loudly! She ripped right through the few buildings that stood in her way. In her fury, she actually ended up causing more destruction then the male just did, but she was too furious to care. She began to violently snarl at the male, snapping her jaws right in his face! The male Hyena began to shake and giggle in fear. He had really messed up! He quickly got up from his butt shaped crater and started running up the road. The angry Matriarch followed after him, continuing to snarl. She wasn’t letting him off the hook that easily!

The male Hyena soon sensed he was being chased. This frightened him even further! In his fear, the Hyena completely lost control of his blatter! Hot, green stinking liquid rocketed out of the tip of his penis. It loudly landed with a splatter on the street below. As he continued running, his penis flopped around, spraying the urine everywhere! It was enough to flood the entire street! The stinking liquid quickly overloaded the streets sewers. The piss, having no where else to go, flowed inside the nearby apartments and condos. It crashed into the first floor and then flooded the basement levels. The corrosive properties of the piss easily dissolved all those it came into contact with, even before they had a chance to drown! Beyond the destruction to the first floor and basement units, the piss also had another effect that caused misery to those in the rest of the building.

The strong stench worked its way upwards, stinking up every suite. Every square inch of those buildings were now permanently stained with the putrid odor. The humans coughed and gagged, as all their homes were stunk up by his smelly liquid. The humans cursed, wanting the smell to stop!

Luckily for a few “fortunate” humans, they didn’t have long to suffer with the smell. As the angry female stomped after the running male, her vibrations rocked the pissed logged buildings. That, along with the heavy damaged foundation caused a few not as well constructed buildings to collapse into a pile of pissed stained rubble! One after another, those weaker buildings collapsed as the female ran by. Although, once again, she was too focused on the males punishment to notice her destruction.

Further down, the third male was watching the commotion of both his clanmates getting reprimanded. He couldn’t believe how easily the other males had messed up! Now the Matriarch was going to be in a bad mood. Suddenly, he had a great idea! He would not only impress the Matriarch by following her orders perfectly, but go even beyond that and show off how skilled he could be without damaging anything! He bet she would be so impressed, she would allow him to mate with her again! Drooling onto the pavement as he imagined mounting her, what feat does he attempt?
1423321122211212111121122122.title: Scared Piss-less

14233211222112121111211221222.content:
The third Hyena was thinking of what he could do to impress the female. It had to not only be an impressive trick, but also without seriously damaging any of the humans and their fragile hives. As he thought and continued walking, he spotted a tall building up ahead. It was twice his height and about the same thickness as his body. The building was the head office of a massive corporation. It was so large, the structure took up the entire width of the city block. It was chocked full of hundreds of employees, who had been taking shelter in their offices since the Hyena clan had invaded. Upon seeing the massive glass structure surrounded by two paths, an idea soon formulated in the Hyenas mind. He would jump from one path, over the human “mound” and then land safely on the other side without damaging anything! If he timed it right, he could preform this trick right as the female was walking on the opposite path, he would impressively land right in front of her! He excitingly ran down the road to get into position, creating all kinds of destruction as he rushed over.

Meanwhile, the rest of the clan had walked much further ahead as the third male was briefly formulating his plan. The first male had his head down, still slightly on edge from the females snarls. The second male was finally able to slow down from running as the female had given up her chase. He too was still tense after his punishment, but at least he felt nice with an empty bladder. Every little bit of unavoidable damage the two males caused as they walked along, made them flinch slightly. They kept bracing, thinking the female was going to come barrelling down at them.

By this point, the female was quite in a sour mood. Sure these human mounds were fragile, but was it so hard not to wreck everything insight! Sometimes males can be so hard headed! She hoped she didn't have to deal with any more of their "accidents". She walked along her own road, almost to keep the other males out of her mind. She didn't realize it, but her mood actually caused her to create more damage then usual. Entire facades of structures caved in, the asphalt road shattered and vehicles were kicked and lodged into buildings as she angrily stomped along.

Finally catching up with the clan, the third male had made it right in front of the building in question. Getting ready for his jump, the Hyena turned perpendicular to the opposite road. He felt his fluffy tail rip through the restaurant behind him. He felt the front store windows shatter as his tail ripped through and crushed everything and everyone inside. Scared, he frantically looked around, but luckily the Matriarch was not on his street to notice his little mishap. Relieved, he then looked up at the tall structure. It seemed a lot bigger close up! He started to get nervous, not sure if he could jump that high! He stood there worrying for a bit. His thoughts were then interrupted by the feeling of heavy stomps... THE FEMALE! He realized he was supposed to be timing this trick perfectly and he had no idea were she was! Luckily, the first males tail had smashed a hole into a neighboring building has he had previously walked by. This gave the third male a view of the opposite road. Through it, he could see the female was already in position! He had to jump right now! Having no more time to second guess himself, the Hyena focused and jumped upwards with all his might!

What was the outcome of his little impressive stunt?
14233211222112121111211221222.title: Hyena Hop

142332112221121211112112212222.content:
He leapt forward! The asphalt under him shattered, spreading cracks and shattering windows throughout the nearby buildings. The Hyena was soon sailing through the air! His jump carried him higher and higher until his body was over the tall building! He looked like he was going to make it! Unfortunately, the Hyena was about to learn just how little grip shattered asphalt has to offer. With no more momentum to carry him, the Hyena soon felt himself falling back towards the earth, with the building squarely underneath him! His eyes went wide as he realized he was about to completely belly flop on top of the fragile structure!

The occupants inside the building were frightened at the massive creature as it stared at them. They had no idea all their lives were being risked, for the simple act of impressing a female Hyena. Since they had backed away from the windows in fear, the humans only heard what was happening. They listened to a massive crashing sound, followed by a great "whoosh" outside the building. After a few short seconds of silence, a devastating sound of destruction was heard at the top of the building. The top brass CEO was the first to go, followed by the other executives and then eventually the office workers. Each level's occupants saw their roof collapsing in on them, before everything went black. The destruction then continued its way to the next floor, repeating the process.

The Hyena could only yelp as he felt everything getting crushed under him. He heard more and more crashing until finally he landed on the ground with a great "thud". His legs lay sprawled out and he was laying on his belly. Great dust clouds were kicked up everywhere! As the dust cleared, the male just laid there, in complete horrific shock of what just happened. He looked down under his belly and whined as he realized the entire building and all its humans had been completely pancaked under him. He couldn't even feel any survivors squirming! His trick was a complete failure... and he had ruined such a healthy looking hive full of juicy humans... So much for impressing the Matriarch! The Hyena suddenly felt a chill travel down his spine. He also sensed the presents of a piercing stare looking right at him. Slowly, he looked upwards, only to lock eyes with the Matriarch staring down at him!

She was in the exact position on the opposite road like he was expecting. Although instead of being impressed, she was standing over him, staring with a complete shocked, rage filled gaze! The other two males had looked over when they heard the loud crashing noise. Both were slightly giddy when they saw what had happened. A mess up that bad and the female would forget about being angry at them! They both continued looking at the Matriarch and third male, they were like siblings waiting to see how a family member would get punished. Both males took this brief opportunity to settle down and watch, while also causing a bit of purposeful destruction. They knew the Matriarch was going to be too pissed at their third clan mate to notice. The first male got the chance to give a decent sized looking supermarket a good stomp. He savored the moment, as he very much knew his actions were not allowed. He ended up ruining multiple tons of food supply that the nearby humans were hoping to eat. The second male was once again crushing a tall building with his behind, only this time it was on purpose. He ground his butt and genitals on the flattened wreckage, almost as if to get some kind of revenge on the humans for the punishment he had received from the Matriarch. "That's what you get for not holding my weight" the second Hyena thought to himself, as his rubbing butt carelessly smashed into the sides of neighboring buildings. Lucky for them both, the Matriarch did not notice their naughty antics.

The Matriarch continued simply looking right into the third males eyes, giving him a good stare down. Part of her was completely furious, wanting to rough him up right then and there as punishment! However, another part of her recognize that he had been at least trying to follow her orders, unlike the other two. She had seen him making an effort to jump over the building instead of plowing through it. Meanwhile the third male simply kept lying there, frozen in fear, almost dousing the remains of the humans and structure with his urine. She took a deep breath and made her decision.

What does she do?
142332112221121211112112212222.title: Building Belly Flop

choices: It was intact, but something was flying around in the air
There was a massive trail of damage! Some animal had snuck into their territory!
1423321122211212111121122122222.content:
The Matriarch simply lowered her snout, placing her nose against the male. He was still laying on the ground and bracing for the worst! However, all the female did was let out a weak snarl. This caused the male to quickly jump up to his feet. He slowly backed away from the mighty Matriarch, all while whining and giggling in submission. He could tell he was getting off the hook easily and didn't dare do anything to further upset her. He quickly ran back onto the road, not even bothering to shake off the debris from the building he had crushed. Chunks of concrete and dead humans fell from his body, leaving a trail behind him. The female scoffed slightly, she knew something that simple was all it took to reprimand the third clanmate.

The other two males were in shock just how easily he was let off the hook! They then broke into a slight panic, realizing the Matriarch was now coming their way! They assumed she was going to take a lot longer with the punishment, and now both males had to quickly hide their recent naughty destruction to the city. The first male used his paws to bury the stomped remains of the supermarket. He ended up greatly damaging the nearby stores as he did so. The second male quickly got up from his "seat". His behind and privates were covered in the debris of the building he had just crushed. He knew doing the traditional canine shake would make too much noise, as he would be scattering the chunks of building that were stuck to his fur. Thinking quickly, he decided to wipe off his behind on the building across the street. The action was successful in cleaning his behind and balls, but he ended up inadvertently ripping the entire front facade off that building. Luckily for both Hyena's, despite their hastened and messy actions to cover up the evidence, the Matriarch ended up not noticing their bad behavior.

As a result of the female's reprimanding, there were no more major "accidents" along the way to their destination. Nothing more then the usual crashing of tarmac, flattening of cars and smashing of windows with tails. This put the Matriarch in a much better mood, as she felt the males finally got the message through their thick skulls. After a bit more stomping, the clan arrived at a new district of the city. In what state do they find the area in?
1423321122211212111121122122222.title: Getting Off Easy

choices: Run and scare the birds off!
14233211222112121111211221222221.content:
The female was happy to note that this section of the human's hives lay undisturbed, meaning no animals had been entering their territory. She didn't notice any pawprints or knocked down buildings. That was one positive thing about the humans fragile structures, it was very easy to tell if an animal had passed through. However, looking upwards, she noticed something different. There were multiple birds flying around the area. They were of various types of species you would find on a Savanna, some were quite colorful while others were only dark shades. To the Hyenas, these birds were regularly sized, but to the humans they were giant flying monsters! The birds had come through a portal earlier that day and were trying to adapt to their new environment.

The Matriarch looked up and observed the birds. Quite a few of the flying creatures were landing on the tops and sides of skyscrapers. Their talons easily dug into the faces of the buildings as if they were made of sand. The birds then proceeded to pick at the windows, smashing their beaks inward. After a bit of digging and crashing around, they would pull out a human! The small human struggled and cried out within the bird's grasp. The bird simply flicked its head backwards, sending the human down in-between its beak. Once the bird gobbled them down, they repeated the process, leaving a trail of massive gashes in the buildings. They were picking the humans out as if they were bugs hiding in trees!

The humans inside the buildings tried their best to run away from the areas that the birds were pecking on. However, the birds were smart and quick enough to change pecking locations to where the humans had moved to. To the birds, the humans were way easier to feed on then any bugs they had encountered in the past! A few male birds were even grabbing multiple humans at a time. They held them firmly in their beaks as they flew off to an awaiting female, who was sitting on top of a nearby building. The male bird would then lovingly drop the flailing group of humans into the females beak, where she would swallow them down. The Matriarch knew those bird couples would be creating a nest soon and then get to mating.

The humans who were swallowed by the birds, ended up dying a very painful death. Those who survived the bird's stomach were grounded up alive within the birds gizzard. Besides causing the humans pain and suffering, the bird's digestive system was also very effective at digesting the humans quite quickly. Despite only starting to snack on the humans a short while ago, many birds were already raising their tails and squirting out what was once humans as white liquidy bird poop. The waste was strong enough to shatter through windows. The poo also left massive white streaks all over the entire length of some buildings.

Seeing the birds feasting on the humans and nesting in their territory, what does the Matriarch decide to do?
14233211222112121111211221222221.title: A Flying Feast

142332112221121211112112212222212.content:
Luckily for the birds, the Matriarch did not see them as a threat. She would simply let them continue to feast on the humans. Back in their home on the Savanna, the clan would often see birds nesting in the trees within their territory. If they weren't a problem back then, why should it be any different now? Besides even if they scared the birds away, they would just flock back after the Hyenas left this section of city. The Matriarch also realized, if the Hyena clan did end up consuming all the humans in the hive, they could turn to eating these birds instead! This made her feel more at ease, at least she had a back-up plan if their human supply ran dry. This was extra important, especially after all the destruction the males had done.

The Hyena was grateful it was only harmless birds the clan had found in this section of city. However, seeing how easily the birds had showed up, she was getting worried at other, more dangerous, animal's would soon start making their way in. The humans were easy pickings and she was sure any animal that wandered close wouldn't hesitate to make a meal of them. The Matriarch then thought back to the Lion pride the clan had briefly encountered the previous day. At the rate those Lions were eating and destroying, they would have definitely finished "consuming" their human hive and would be on a hunt for another! They needed to get scent marking ASAP!

The female knew she had to command the males to get those anal glands ready! They would have this whole place stunk up in no time! Right as she was about to open her mouth, a slight bit of debris sprinkled onto her head. This of course didn't hurt, but it was enough to distract her to look upwards. There, she saw a rather large bird smash into an office building, pluck roughly a dozen screaming humans and then fly off. "At least they don't eat much", she thought to herself, slightly amused. She figured only one of her mouthfuls was more humans then multiple birds could ever hope to eat! She then imagined herself swallowing a maw full of tasty humans.

Suddenly, the Matriarch felt her stomach growl. Seeing the birds snacking on the humans made her realize just how hungry she was! She knew the rest of the clan would also be in a similar state of hunger, given that none of them have had a full meal since the previous night. However, she knew delaying the marking further would be risky. Every moment they waited would simply increase the chance of other animals wandering into the many different parts of their city. Should the clan get to marking the area right away or have a snack first?

What does the Matriarch command them to do:
142332112221121211112112212222212.title: Feathered Friends

choices: The clan finally gets to marking that section of city
They suddenly catch a scent down wind!
1423321122211212111121122122222122.content:
While she did want to get to marking, a quick snack wouldn't hurt right? Besides, she had to make sure the clan was nourished, so they were alert and ready for anything. The Matriarch told herself this, trying to help her conscience feel at ease, when really she was just very hungry! With a whoop, she commanded the males to go hunt down some food. The males excitingly broke into a dash, shattering the road surfaces under them, ready to feast! The female quickly followed up her whoop with a fairly angry sounding growl. The males quickly slow down and began walking more cautiously. The first and second males had almost completely forgot about the Matriarch's instructions in their excitement. The clan then split up to go feed on some humans, with the males being sure to copy the females technique she had showed them earlier. Since all the tall skyscrapers were so high up, and infested with birds, all the Hyenas decided to try their luck with a few mid-rise buildings.

The Matriarch was the first to find her building to feed on, which was comprised of luxury condos. The female was impressed how shiny and "pretty" the building looked when compared to others in the city, as it had a fancy modern design. She figured the humans inside must be of high quality then, like they were a premium cut of meat! Wasting no time, she placed her front leg on the buildings roof and began to rub it side to side. This caused the entire building to sway, cracks formed all over as the structure was put under heavy load. Internally, furniture, fragile objects and other human's belongings were going crashing everywhere. The wealthy occupance were in a panic, desperately trying to escape this "earthquake" before the building collapsed! Pushing and shoving, they all ran to the front entrance to escape, just like the Matriarch had planned. She had her maw right at the front doors, greedily slurping and gulping anyone trying to escape. The rich folks expensive perfume and cologne did give them a slightly different taste to the female Hyena, which she enjoyed. It was like they were given some kind of marinade!

However, the humans inside soon caught on, that their was some kind of pink, slimy, smelly monster grabbing people from the front doors! Still in a panic, the humans soon rushed themselves to the side fire exits of the building.

The Matriarch soon grunted angrily. The flow of humans had stopped, but she could still hear them shuffling about inside. She gave the building another strong shake, causing more damage, but not producing more humans. Looking around the building, she soon realized the humans had made extra exits, that they were now using to escape! The Matriarch thought to herself, "I guess these creatures are a bit more clever then I thought. Good thing us Hyena's are still smarter!".

She then used her front paws to crush the fire exit! The humans currently in the doorway were flattened with a sickening "crunch". Debry fell from the upper wall and blocked the exit! Ensuring that it was fully sealed, she also dragged over a bit of shattered debris from another building as well as a few vehicles. She crushed them against the fire exit, completely sealing it off. She repeated the same for the other exits she found. Satisfied with her work, she proceeded to place her maw back to the only exit available to the humans, continuing to send them to a one way trip to her belly.

The rest of the males also had a similar experience to the female. They quickly found and plugged the extra exits of the buildings they had chosen to feast on. Soon about four buildings worth of humans were being digested alive in the four different Hyenas stomachs.

Feeling herself fully stuffed, the female let out a large burp, shattering a few windows. She could still hear a few small groups of humans within the heavily damaged structure. They were cowering in fear, unsure what to do! The Matriarch did not want to eat/kill these last remaining humans, in fact she wanted the exact opposite! She then giggled directly at the group, as if talking to them, "Ok little ones, make sure you have lots and lots and lots of SEX! Breed those numbers back up! I would hate for this to be the last of your flavorful kind". She assumed the rich people with their slightly different flavor from their perfume and cologne were a slight subset of the human species. She definitely would like to taste them again! She just had to wait for them to breed back up so she could have another fill.

Now that all the Hyenas hunger was satisfied, what do they decide to do next?
1423321122211212111121122122222122.title: Having a Flavored Snack

choices: Oh no! It was the pride of Lions from before!
14233211222112121111211221222221222.content:
The Matriarch did not want to delay marking any further. The scent of the city was sure going to change once the males got started! It will be nice to have the city smell like home, she thought to herself. She figured they would start in this section and then work their way around to the rest of the city. As she was briefly lost in her thoughts, she suddenly heard the sound of crashing and screaming humans!

Annoyed, she looked around to see which of the clan's males were causing some destruction. However, she soon noticed all three of the males were sitting patiently, still waiting for her next order. Her eyes went wide as she realized, at least this time, the destruction wasn't being caused by any of the pack. Oh no! She nervously sniffed the air and picked up a whiff of another animal that was entering their territory! She cursed at herself, she should not have delayed the scent marking!

The scent and sound was coming from a far off section of city, in the suburbs. The large female let out a massive whoop, signaling the clan to follow! She then turned herself in the direction of the commotion and set off. She tore through the buildings that stood in her way! It was an emergency after all! They didn't have time to tread carefully on the roads, so she simply plowed a direct path. The humans that laid in her wake had no chance to react, they simply felt massive vibrations before a Hyena paw descended on top of them. She was sure the humans that didn't end up as stains on her paws would appreciate the clan defending the territory. The males quickly raced after the Matriarch, also ripping through everything in their paths. They ran slightly abreast, as if creating a "V" formation. All of the Hyenas dicks flopped greatly as they ran, one of which was growing slightly erect. It was the first male, who loved to crash through buildings. He was having a wonderful time feeling them crumble under paw. He even took this rare opportunity to cheekily aim and stomp the biggest structures that laid in his path.

After running many many miles, the Hyenas started to approached the residential area. The clan dropped onto their bellies and skidded to a stop, turning any humans that were under them into a red smear. Behind them lay miles and miles of complete destruction. Hundreds of buildings were reduced to nothing more then Hyena pawprints along with hundreds of thousands of humans that were now dead. Although, the Matriarch was unworried by all the death and destruction the clan just created. If they didn't stop these invading animals and the clan lost control of their new territory, what good are the human lives then? The Hyenas were hiding behind a few buildings to stay out of sight from the other giant animals. The scent was quite strong, meaning their was a group of the creatures! The Matriarch peeked over the buildings and finally saw what they were dealing with. What was currently in the suburbs?
14233211222112121111211221222221222.title: They Got Company!

choices: A group of Kangaroos jumping around
A flock of Ostriches stomping through
142332112221121211112112212222212222.content: Thankfully the invading animals were not life threatening to the Hyenas, they were somewhat down the food chain. However, these animals still might try to defend themselves if attacked, which could lead to an injury to one of the clan. Of course the invading giant animals still had to be dealt with, as they were causing large amounts of destruction and killing many of the Hyena's humans. What species were the creatures?
142332112221121211112112212222212222.title: A threat to the city, but not to them

choices: Yes! They scare the Ostriches away
1423321122211212111121122122222122222.content:
A flock of about ten Ostriches had wandered in to the cities residential area. The massive birds were about three times taller then the male Hyenas. They each had tall skinny legs and very fluffy, feather covered bodies. The colors of their feathers ranged from a dark black to gray, as the flock had a decent mix of males and females. The heads of the Ostriches looked around, taking in this new and strange environment. Thankfully, it seemed that none of the flock had detected the watching Hyenas.

The flock simply treaded carelessly onto the mass of homes, seemingly ignoring their existence. Each one of the Ostrich's massive talons crushed multiple homes with every step, leaving deep prints. Predictably, the humans who lived in that area were all running around aimlessly in a panic. A few of the Ostriches noticed the tiny running creatures and were casually picking off a few from the crowds. They simply swallowed the humans alive, treating them no differently then simple insects. Most Ostriches just ignored the mass of screaming humans, uncaringly stomping them all out underfoot. The potent odor of the Ostriches bodies caused many of the humans below to cough and gag. The humans were so distracted by the smell, that they were unable to focus on more important things, like dodging incoming Ostrich feet.

With the twenty stomping talons, it was not long before the flock had created a massive amount of destruction to the suburb. The Ostriches were quite spread out from each other, walking over the entire width of the area. As they made their way across the suburbs, the flock wasn't carving a trail of destruction, they were wiping everything out! What lay behind the Ostriches was completely devastated, all that remained of the once lovely neighborhood was exposed earth mixed in with bits of debris.

The Matriarch watched the Ostrich flock intently as they wrecked the suburbs. She was not sure what to do! On one paw, it seemed like the massive birds were only passing through the clans territory. This meant the Hyenas could avoid a potentially painful conflict if they just stayed hidden. Plus, since the city's humans gave the clan plenty of nourishment, it wasn't necessary to hunt down the Ostriches for food.

However, at the rate the Ostriches were going, the entire area of tiny human hives was going to be completely leveled! Every second that passed, more and more of the area was wiped off the map. She watched anxiously for a few more moments, before she finally made her decision. Does she command the clan to save the suburbs or do they simply leave them to the Ostriches?
1423321122211212111121122122222122222.title: Ostrich Flock

15222121112112212212122411222221111.title: Dreamy Pleasure

choices: Go take care of his morning wood
Start to hunt down more humans
152221211121122122121224112222211111.content:
The anthro suddenly jolted awake. Looking around, reality soon came washing back over him. He was still stuck in the same strange world with the older anthro. "Humph, and it was such a nice dream too!", the younger anthro pouted to himself. He was quite disappointed to be back in reality! That dream felt so nice... real nice. Hopefully the next humans they find will be just as friendly as the ones in his dream! He would definitely need to give them a "try" when they track down more of the humans.

The sun was just starting to rise, so the Wolf figured he might as well get up. As the younger Wolf sat upwards, he noticed the older male was still sleeping. A familiar odor was also wafting in the air. Looking over, he could see the sleeping Wolf had a massive hard on! He then heard him mumble loudly as he slumbered, "Don't worry, once I untie... I'll breed... you... next...". He too was having a dream that was fueled from the previous days conversation, but his was more focused on the females of the clans.

"Damn horn dog can't keep himself contained!", the younger male thought angrily to himself, realizing the older Wolves mumbling was what woke him up. Once again, the older anthros hornyness was giving him trouble. However, the younger males anger soon subsided when he noticed another scent in the air. Looking down he realized his loin cloth was tented, with a small moist blotch in the middle. It seemed that he also had quite the case of morning wood, especially after his... exciting dream. "Hehe, maybe I'm not one to talk", he sheepishly said to himself, scratching the back of his head. Since the old Wolf was still sleeping, what does the younger one decide to do with his alone time?
152221211121122122121224112222211111.title: Rude Awakening

choices: The scent of an approaching vehicle
The scent of many many humans!
1522212111211221221212241122222111112.content:
After a dream like that, the younger wolf was as eager as ever to find more humans. Even if they were half as "friendly" as the ones from his dream, saving his current urges for them would be quite worth while! He decided to ignore his naughty feelings for now and use the time to hunt out a human colony. The younger Wolf then got to tracking, letting his erection subside.

He walked a few paces away from the old male. Despite the rude awakening, the older male did not wake him on purpose, so he wanted to let him continue his rest. The younger Wolf then entered hunting mode. First he started sniffing westward, but only picked up the scent of nothingness. Unfazed, he turned his attention to a different direction, the east. Sniffing once again provided him with no leads. He felt his frustration growing, but then realized he had been tracking all wrong! The little creatures he was looking for would be close to the ground, he had to search on their level!

The anthro instantly dropped on all fours, sniffing the ground expectantly. All he could smell was the scent of pine, but at least it was a start. He crawled around, continuing to sniff and crush hundreds of trees. His balls and sheath swayed side to side with the motion of his movements. Before long, the Wolf finally found something unexpected. Before him laid a paved road, that seemingly cut through the forest. He cocked his head, then used his two front paws to dig at the road, easily ripping up the surface. With the road unknowingly ruined, the Wolf got a whiff of the shattered asphalt. He remembered that scent from the last human hive he was in! The town's road surfaces had been damaged when both of the Wolves large paws stomped around, exposing the asphalt smell.

"These must be the creature's paths...perhaps it's made from their compacted droppings?", he thought to himself, unable to comprehend how else the road could be made. He figured the small human creatures would simply defecate as they walked along, while their other fellow brethren would end up flattening the waste underfoot. He grinned, this would make them super easy to track! He just had to follow this strip of their droppings. Still on all fours, the anthro looked down the seemingly endless strip. The flat road allowed for far off scents to easily travel along without being defused by the forest. What was he able to smell?
1522212111211221221212241122222111112.title: Finding the Human Path

choices: Yes, the city already has another visitor making a mess
No, they are the first giants to find it
15222121112112212212122411222221111122.content:
As he felt a breeze blowing in from the south, the younger male gingerly sniffed the air. Amazingly, he was finally able to detect the scent of something other then asphalt! It was humans! Lots and lots of humans! Much more then what was in his dream! The Wolf could tell they were all down wind, further south!

Barely able to contain his excitement, the younger Wolf jumped up from all fours and ran back to his sleeping companion. Not wanting to wait any longer, he shook the still sleeping elder Wolf. He soon awoke, and was quite grumpy from the sudden wake-up call.

"What's the big idea- HEY!"

The older Wolf did not have a chance to voice his frustrations as the younger Wolf was already running ahead! Not wanting to get left behind, the older anthro quickly ran after him! He was still sporting an erection from his naughty dream, quietly cursing at the other Wolf for not letting him rub one out. The younger Wolf ran along the road he had found and the older Wolf followed behind, doing his best to keep up. Their great massive paws hit the ground hard, completely decimating the road, blowing over many trees and flattening rural homes. The younger Wolf was so excited, he didn't notice the damage he was causing.

After many miles, and stomped out homes later, the younger male could just see the shimmering of something in the distance. Tall hives! They were the same height as those in his dream! He was about to double down in his running speed, when he heard something wheezing behind him. The older male was calling out, begging him to stop. Sure the older anthro was still in tip top shape, but having to run that fast for that long so quickly was proving to be too much for him. Feeling slightly guilty of how he acted, the younger male slowed down his pace to a walk, allowing the older one to catch up.

"What the hell is wrong with you! Why did you suddenly go running off like that!" The older Wolf barked out angrily.

"Sorry elder, when I woke I was able to track down the small creatures so easily! Look up ahead, there is a massive hive of them!"

"Really?" the older Wolf sounded impressed, "How did you hunt them down? I didn't smell any scents on the way here".

"It's this path they made", he quickly snatched up one of the many broken sections of road and handed it to the other Wolf, "It's made from their droppings".

"Hmmm, I see", the older Wolf pondered, giving the chunk of asphalt a sniff, "Ha! I'm surprised how easily they were able to lead you then! Usually prey animals spread their droppings, as not to lead other creatures to their dens. The predators in this world must have it so easy!". He said, almost mockingly.

Upon hearing this, the younger Wolf was no longer fazed by the thoughts of humans being preyed upon. It didn't matter how easily predators could find the humans. He knew he would protect and save them from any incoming dangers! Just like he did in his dream!

The older Wolf then piped up with a question, "Wait, how are you even sure the hives that lie ahead are from the same species? Maybe they are from a different type of small creature?". The older Wolf wanted to make sure they weren't wasting a trip hunting the wrong prey.

"Oh, well... I saw something very similar to them in my dream from last night". The younger Wolf then went on to explained his dream experience to the older anthro in great detail. This made the other Wolf quite intrigued, as well as excited, as he secretly gave his sheath a few rubs.

"My My, that was quite the dream you had! I'm almost thinking these small creatures might be your spirit animal! Come! Let see if you can get them to give me- err- you, a similar treatment!"

With both Wolves quite excited, they were finally nearing the metropolis. Being one of the largest northern cities, it would be the first heavily populated area any giant arctic dwelling creatures would come into contact with. That being said, is the city already being visited by another animal that the Wolves need to "protect" it from?
15222121112112212212122411222221111122.title: Like Christmas Morning!

152221211121122122121224112222211111222.content:
The younger Wolf was quite happy to see that the city was completely untouched. Nothing but the scent of happy humans emanated from it. Both the Wolves eyes went wide as they approached the city. Many of the tall structures were up to their shoulders in height. This was a stark contrast from the small town they had first encountered. The younger male panted heavily. They were so pretty looking! Unlike from his dream, these "mounds" were so shiny and sparkly. Did the creatures make them look extra nice because they sensed he was coming?

Both Wolves continued forward at a brisk pace. They were very excited, which was quite evident by their growing erections, which bobbed as they walked. They were so enamored with the excitement of the city and its many buildings, that they completely failed to notice what was directly underpaw. They were inadvertently leveling the cities outskirts. Even as they progressed to increasingly populated areas, they still failed to noticed the many small buildings and humans being crushed flat under them. Much of the outlying districts were left in ruin as the two anthros excitingly walked through.

After many crunchy footsteps, both anthros soon reached the proper edge of the city. Both Wolves were amazed at what they saw and tried to make sense of it. "Crazy they make all of this with just their poo and spit", said the older male, still a bit too confident in his understanding of the human creatures. They then both saw that the sides of the hives were full of small grid like segments, "I bet that's where they keep their food and lay their larva", the older male continued to explain. They then saw many little colorful shells littered on the ground. They made the dull gray paths look quite pretty! "I wonder where they collect these shells from?" inquired the younger male. "They're probably hollowed out exoskeletons of whatever insects these small creatures prey on", the older male answered back.

Both anthros then grinded wildly as they saw thousands upon thousands upon thousands of humans pouring out of the various bases of the tall mounds! The older male groaned and gave his sheath a few strokes, he wanted to feel their small bodies rub his sensitive areas! Unfortunately, that did not seem to be the case. Unlike what was described by the younger male, the crowds were moving in the opposite direction, running further into the city!

The older male grunted. "Hmm, I guess their not coming out to give us that 'treatment'", he said slightly annoyed. He was hoping for the same service that the younger male had described from his dream.

"No don't you see! They're leading us! They want us to go deeper into their hive...maybe they have a surprise waiting!", the younger male said excitingly. The various tall buildings ended up blocking the scent of fear the humans were producing, as they desperately ran from the invading monsters.

The thought of a surprise didn't take long to convince the older male. Soon both Wolves were walking along the streets of the city. Both anthros were definitely not going to fit on one road, so they split up and walked on two parallel streets. They walked slowly, allowing the hordes of humans to run ahead before they placed their titanic paws down. The tall buildings gently swayed side to side as the behemoths made their way deeper into the city. They left massive prints in the pavement and crushed all kinds of vehicles. Both Wolves were unconcerned however, they were sure the humans didn't care if those colorful shell things got crushed. Besides, like the older male said, they were just discarded shells from the humans prey.

As they walked along, what happens?

1553132211211.content:
You are siting in the window seat of a plane, trying to fall asleep as the flight will be quite long and you will have to wake up early in the morning tomorrow and it's already late so you might as well catch some sleep while you can.

Just as your eyes start to close, you see the light outside of your window dim quite dramatically. You think nothing of it but some of the other passengers seem to be pointing out the windows and the volume in the cabin starts to rise as many people start to talk, first at a whisper but soon growing louder and louder.

Seeing as these conditions are not conductive of sleep, you take a look outside of the window yourself and gasp at what you see. A massive bird is hovering in the air not too far off from the plane. It looks confused and is turning it's head from left to right as if it is trying to gain back it's bearings. It is impossible to judge how big the bird is from your point of view but from the looks of it, it is at least large enough that it would make you have a pretty bad time should it notice the plane.

Unfortunately, that is exactly what it does. The bird locks eyes on the plane and it seems to look at your in particular, though that could be a mere coincidence. The canary starts to fly towards the plane at a rapid pace. It looks like it would easily able to outstrip all but the fastest fighter jets, though even those could be hard pressed to beat the massive bird.

The volume in the cabin continues to rise as the canary gets closer to the plane, first starting at a curious whisper and soon growing to shocked yelling. The canary quickly catches up to the plane and catches it in it's claws, the hull of the plane denting heavily and the wings being crushed under the powerful talons of the far to big to exist bird. You can see where the canary's talons are as there are huge portions of the metal protruding a good foot inwards. But strangely enough the bird, despite being more than capable of it, does not crush the plane any more than it had already done so.

The canary starts to fly off with the plane and it's screaming passengers in it's claws.

Where does it take the plane?

Height can vary from a few hundred feet to five thousand feet. However, the size scale needs to stay the same for a storyline.
Unless of course there is a 'normal' size difference A 3ft Feral Wolf to a 8ft anthro Lion. But no 200ft Wolves with a 2500ft one in
the same storyline!

The giant Anthros & Taurs can be from any time period/culture.

Feral animals maybe either wild, pet/companions for the anthros/Taurs or sentient.
Pets/companions may have collars, harnesses saddles etc. Whilst wild of course won't have anything artificial.

Language - For simplicity all characters 'speak' English. Though in reality the giants have their own languages it will
be difficult to make up several new languages. Humans won't understand a giant and vice versa though to us they would both
be talking clear English

The 'small' planet is basically modern Earth with humans but it's not Earth Itself.

Real places, landmarks, buildings etc. Can be used as a reference in the story though.

New portals may open up to remove/add giants, for some reason humans can't be transported through the portals.

The story can change to follow a new giant instead, but try to leave an option to still follow the previous giant.

Any theme allowed. The giants can be harmed/ killed by each other or by humans, they aren't invincible!

Oh and 'attack' isn't always accurate. The giants could be friendly or curious but a 500ft tall giant is going to cause some damage even if it's unintentional.
